title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Favoring negotiation over power struggles and ego games is the smartest strategy today. Some people think the goal is to win at nearly any cost. But victory often comes with ceaseless squabbles for control and dominance, without ever attaining the elusive aspiration of true peace. Thankfully, cooperation is possible now. Transform an impulse to clash with a colleague or competitor into an opportunity to strike a mutually beneficial deal. Be patient if they dont take you up on your offer right away. A relatively short wait is a much better option than a protracted conflict. Drama is a waste of everyones time. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
